headline: Does ON Stock Present Opportunity After a 3.5% Weekly Dip?
summary: If you have been eyeing ON Semiconductor, you're not alone in wondering if it's the right moment to make a move. The stock has been on a wild ride lately, dipping 3.5% over the last week, finding a modest uptick of 1.1% over the past month, and sitting well below where it started the year with a -17.8% return. It's even farther off last year’s highs, down 28.8% over the past 12 months. If you zoom out to five years, however, the story shifts entirely. The stock has actually surged over 100%...
